beamset.name: AbdPelv Central 2Arc
beamset.description: Arc set for 24 degree posterior avoidance

beamset.name: AbdPelv Central 3Arc
beamset.description: Arc set for 24 degree posterior avoidance with 270 degree collimator rotation

beamset.name: Abd Left 2Arc
beamset.description: 2 arc arrangment for treatment of the left lung or abdomen.

beamset.name: Abd Left NORPM 4Arc
beamset.description: 4 Arc arrangement for treatment of the left lung or abdomen. Couch kicks are used which will make RPM difficult.

beamset.name: Abd Right 2Arc
beamset.description: 2 Arc arrangement for treating the right lung or abdomen.

beamset.name: Abd Right NORPM 4Arc
beamset.description: 4 Arc arrangement for treatment of the right lung or abdomen. Not appropriate for treatment which uses RPM due to couch kicks.

optimization_config.name: 12 warmstarts
optimization_config.description: 12 warmstart optimization with varying dose grid
